posts.post_title: N175 Gypsy Queen Danny Richardson SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Wesley
SOLD  

N175 Gypsy Queen Danny Richardson, N. Y. SGC 40 VG

Richardson is one of the nine which are known to exist in the larger N175 Gypsy Queen series.  This is the only small size Richardson graded by SGC.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1118369089.JPG[/IMG] 


$1100 or best offer
Anyone know how may have this card sold on the BST years ago?
